stockCase.meta_title: Build a HK IPO Monitor Bot in 3 Mins
stockCase.meta_description: Learn how to build a 24/7 Hong Kong Stock IPO monitor using OpenClaw without coding. Get real-time alerts via Feishu/Lark. The ultimate Local-First AI tutorial.
stockCase.title: Build a HK Stock IPO
stockCase.subtitle: Always missing Hong Kong IPO opportunities? Don't want to check the exchange website daily?
stockCase.painPoint1: Manually checking the HKEx website for new IPOs every day
stockCase.painPoint2: Missing the subscription period for desired companies
stockCase.painPoint3: Want real-time IPO info but no time to monitor
stockCase.stepsTitle: Just 3 steps, let OpenClaw monitor for you
stockCase.step1Description: Just tell OpenClaw in natural language which website and when to monitor:
stockCase.step1Example:
"Every day at 9:00 AM, open https://www.hkexnews.hk/,
check if there are any new IPO announcements."
stockCase.step1Check: OpenClaw will automatically understand your intent and visit the target website on schedule
stockCase.step2Description: Tell OpenClaw the keywords you care about and the information to extract:
stockCase.step2Example:
"If there's news containing the keyword 'prospectus',
extract the title and link."
stockCase.step2Check: AI will intelligently identify page content and accurately extract the information you need
stockCase.step3Description: Final step, let OpenClaw send the information to you:
stockCase.step3Example: "Via Feishu plugin, send me the extracted title and link."
stockCase.step3Check: Supports multiple push methods including Feishu, Telegram, Discord, etc.
stockCase.demoCompany: „ÄêProspectus„ÄëA Technology Co., Ltd. Initial Public Offering Prospectus
stockCase.demoNote: üí° This is a simulated Feishu message effect
stockCase.ctaDescription: Deploy OpenClaw now and start building your personal AI assistant.
stockCase.ctaSubDescription: Supports Docker one-click deployment, get started in 5 minutes.
stockCase.footerDisclaimer: This project is for learning and communication purposes only

deploy.title: OpenClaw Docker Deployment Guide
deploy.subtitle: Deploy OpenClaw with Docker in minutes.
deploy.description: Use Docker to quickly deploy OpenClaw and get your AI Agent running in minutes.
deploy.step1Description: If you haven't installed Docker yet, please visit the Docker official website to download and install:
deploy.step1Check: After installation, make sure the Docker service is running
deploy.step2Description: Clone the OpenClaw repository to your local machine:
deploy.step2Check: After cloning, enter the project directory:
deploy.step3Description: Use Docker Compose to start all services with one command:
deploy.step3Check1: parameter means running the container in the background
deploy.step3Check2: The first startup will automatically download the required Docker images, please be patient
deploy.step3Check3: After successful startup, OpenClaw will continue to run in the background
deploy.successDescription: Congratulations! You have successfully deployed OpenClaw. Now you can start configuring your AI Agent and connecting to various platforms.
